column4: I'm really just trying to install a clean version of windows 7...but when I tried the windows install it also stopped at the beginning, so I was just trying to install ubuntu, and then overwrite ubuntu with windows 7
well the reason I want to do a clean install of windows 7, is that my current one will not boot, it is very virused
sorry misunderstood, my situation was that I have win7 running and installed ubuntu through wubi
